articleNo.description: product or article no (can be changes while life cycle)

matchcode.description: name of the product for fast and easy search and find

gtin.description: global trade item number, a worldwide unique number for the product, can be used for barcode and identification in foreign systems

creator.description: idRecord of the user that created the product

modifier.description: idRecord of the user that made the last update to the product

costCalc.description: calculated costs of one unit of the product, is set manually or by a custom algorithm

costAvg.description: average costs of one unit of the product, is calculated each time an amount of units of the product is entering or leaving the stock

costLast.description: last purchase price of one unit of the product

costList.description: list purchase price of one unit of the product

costInventory.description: cost for one unit of the product for inventory / stacktaking

isWorkStep.description: has this product to be treated as a work-step?

isProduction.description: is the a product that has to be produced?

isStockItem.description: must all stock related in and out of this product be related to a storage location?

isStockTracing.description: shall all stock related in and out of this product be protocoled?

isCheckStock.description: may the product be stored to an inspection stock on receive and before delivery? (for quality management)

isService.description: has this product to be treated as a service?

isPacking.description: has this product to be treated as a packing?

isConsumable.description: has this product to be treated as a consumable?

isShipping.description: has this product to be treated as a shipping?

isCharges.description: is this product managed in, and related to charges

isSerialNo.description: is this product managed in, and related to serial numbers

isRohsCompliant.description: is this product compiant to the RoHS-policy 2011/65/EU of the European Union?

netWeight.description: net weight of one unit of the product measured in kg

grossWeight.description: gross weight of one unit of the product measured in kg

length.description: length of one unit of the product

width.description: width of one unit of the product

strength.description: strength of one unit of the product

innerDiameter.description: inner diameter of one unit of the product

outerDiameter.description: outer diameter of one unit of the product

volume.description: volume of one unit of the product

isReverseCharge.description: has this product to be treated as a reverse charge product (VAT has to be payed by the buyer)

isDiscount.description: is it allowed to give a discount when selling the product?

isReduction.description: is the price for the product reduced?

isIntrastat.description: is the selling and buying of this product relevant to the EU-policy 638/2004, named intrastat?

isPreferential.description: is the country of origin qualified for preference according to EU-policy 1207/2001, 1617/2006, 75/2008

customsTariff.description: customs traiff number of the product

replacementTime.description: replacement time in days, how long does it take to get the product to stock

active.description: is the product active (1) or archived (2)

taxInformation.description: idAccount 0..4, 10..14, 0R - are pointing to tax-accounts for selling and purchasing

ArticleGroup.description: what kind of article-group is this?

ArticleGroupDescription.description: description or name of the article-group

numberPlate.description: What is the international number-plate sign for the country?

description.description: A short description of the country (national use)

areaCode.description: Local code that is used in the country for the country

isoCode.description: ISO-3166 standard number for the country

isoDescription.description: A short description of the country (international use)

intrastatCode.description: Used in Europe for EU-trade tax control

isPurchase.description: Is this unit used in purchase-processes?

isSale.description: Is this unit used in sale-processes?

isProduction.description: Is this unit used in production-processes?

name.description: What is the name of the unit?

abbreviation.description: What is the short-name of the unit?

frame.description: Where is the storage - Name of the rack

hall.description: Where is the storage - Name of the building

corridor.description: Where is the storage - Name of the floor

group.description: idRecord of a choicer record - storage group relation (choicer)

site.description: idRecord of a choicer record - storage site relation (choicer)

address.description: idRecord of an address - storage address relation (supplier or customer or...)

companyUnit.description: idRecord of a companyUnit - storage company-unit relation

isStorageReceipt.description: Is this a storage for incoming goods?

isStorageCheck.description: Is this a storage for goods in quality check?

isStorageSalvage.description: Is this a storage for blocked goods?

isStorageCommission.description: Is this a storage for commissions?

isStorageProducts.description: Is this a storage for self produced goods?

isStorageDispatch.description: Is this a storage for the dispatch of goods?

isStorageConsignment.description: Is this a storage for consignment goods?

isStorageExternal.description: Is this storage in an external warehouse?

isSupermaket.description: Is this a storage a supermarket for kanban storage?

isDisposable.description: Is this a storage readily available?

subCode.description: abbreviation of the digit-part of the currency

subDescription.description: complete name of the digit-part of the currency

digits.description: how many digits are behind the comma of the currency

divisor.description: amount of subCode within one code

factor.description: conversion factor to calculate to the system currency (may change dayly)

base.description: Conversion base to calculate to the system currency

lotNo.description: external charge no of the supplier

dtIn.description: Date when the charge was entered into the storage

dtProduction.description: Date when the charge was produced

lotNo.description: external serial-no no of the supplier

dtIn.description: Date when the serial-no was entered into the storage

dtProduction.description: Date when the serial-no was produced

amount.description: How many times is the product needed in the list
How many times is the product needed in the list

isManual.description: Has the choicer-entry been added manually

choice.description: Date when the charge was produced
